answers.answer: I have sugar of 110 and 117 at home and sometimes 100 .The last two times I got blood work it was 120 .He did anotherkind of  test and said it was 7.1 My Dr is upset and said I can wait a month and get more blood work .I have talked to lots of different people with high sugar and they think it is ok just watch it ?I am lost ?Thank you very much for any adviceLee

question: I am a 45 year old woman, i exercise 5/6 days a week and am of average weight for my height. I have noticed recently when exercising i am experiencing numbness in my toes and cramp, also a couple of times my feet feel like they are burning and painful. I was advised by a friend to test my blood sugar levels so I tested myself yesterday and this morning. My results were 11.0 early evening about an hour after dinner and then a couple of hours later 11.2. Before I went to bed it was 7.3 and then this morning I did a test after fasting over night and it was 7.1. Is there a correlation between these results and my feet etc? (I did have gestational diabetes controlled with Insulin injections in 1989)
title: Are these blood sugar levels OK
